    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(Registerer registerer)
        Initializes the Flow library with the given Registerer. If none (null) is provided, an instance of SimpleRegisterer is used.
        Parameters:
        registerer - The registerer to be used. Pass null for SimpleRegisterer.

      • deinitialize

        public static void deinitialize()
        Uninitializes the current setup, if any.

      • loadClass

        public static <T> java.util.Optional<T> loadClass(java.lang.Class<T> klass)
        Loads a class and its commands
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class's type
        Parameters:
        klass - The class to load
        Returns:
        An Optional object containing either an instance of the loaded class if successful or null if failed.

      • unloadClass

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> unloadClass(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
        Unloads a class and its (loaded) commands.
        Parameters:
        klass - The class to unload
        Returns:
        A list containing the commands' name that were unloaded.

      • process

        public static boolean process(java.lang.String command,
                              Invoker invoker,
                              Channel chan,
                              Flow flow)
        The main method to be called for when a command is detected and needs to be invoked. Simply call this in place for where normal command look-up and execution logic would be.
        Parameters:
        command - The command name to invoke
        invoker - An instance/implementation of Invoker
        chan - The channel that this command was processed in
        flow - An instance/implementation of Flow
        Returns:
        true if the command was found and processed successfully, false otherwise
